title: Fallout Season 2: GameSpot's Reactions | Gotcha Covered

author: GameSpot
description:
This week Kurt and Lucy gotcha covered with the Fallout TV show's 2nd season, our favorite reveals from the game awards, new Tomb Raider games, and more.

Email your letters to gotchacovered@gamespot.com

title: Fallout Season 2 Rules So Far | Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered
